name: Truck Me Up
description:
"When are you..." Are a trucker? Enjoy the highway!

Your job is to move the cargo as fast as possible. Truck all goods to deliver to the consignee. Earn money and level up. Explore the highway and discover new roads.

How To Play:

— Tap and hold to drive truck
— Release to brake
— Be smart and avoid crashes
— Collect cash and unlock cool trucks
